2025.title: Biotech ingredients market forecast hits USD 3.91B by 2032
2025.description: The global biotech ingredients market is projected to grow from USD 2.32 billion in 2025 to USD 3.91 billion by 2032, driven by precision medicine, gene therapies, and synthetic biology.

2025.title: CRISPR + lipid delivery breakthroughs expand reach
2025.description: Researchers used a thermostable Cas9 with lipid nanoparticles to achieve efficient in vivo genome editing in liver and lungs, improving targeting, delivery, and scalability.

2025.title: AI-led pipelines scale drug discovery
2025.description: Companies like Exscientia expanded AI-managed clinical pipelines in 2025, enhancing success rates and drastically reducing discovery timelines.

2025.title: Synthetic biology scales biomanufacturing
2025.description: 2025 marks a pivot for synthetic biology with the focus shifting from niche high‑value products to commodity‑scale biomanufacturing.

2025.title: 3D bioprinting grows for implants and organoids
2025.description: Research groups develop tissue and cartilage models and print patient-specific organoids for drug screening and regenerative medicine.

2025.title: Retail pharmacy partnerships power real-world evidence for biopharma
2025.description: Biopharma companies are collaborating with community pharmacies to capture real-world patient data, enhance recruitment and post-market insights.

2025.title: Epigenetic inheritance of longevity signals in C. elegans
2025.description: A new study in C. elegans shows parental lysosomal changes trigger epigenome modifications to promote longevity across generations.

2025.title: AI and automation redefine life-science workflows
2025.description: SLAS 2025 conference explores how robotics, AI-driven systems and cloud-native data platforms transform laboratory and biomanufacturing operations.

2025.title: EU advances biotech regulation with new Biotech Act initiative
2025.description: In 2025, the European Commission launched the Biotech Act public consultation to streamline biotech regulation across sectors and simplify approval pathways for clinical trials and biomanufacturing
